actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to repeal section 411 (b) (4) of the Higher Education Act of 1965.

summary.text: Repeals those provisions of the Higher Education Act of 1965 restricting payments for basic educational opportunity grants to those fiscal years in which appropriations for supplemental educational opportunity grants, work-study programs, and capital contributions to student loan funds exceed specified levels.

titles.title: A bill to repeal section 411 (b) (4) of the Higher Education Act of 1965.
